p: For all extracts, 500 mg of air-dried plant material was blended to a fine powder and extracted with 10 mL of methanol in an ultrasonic bath for 20 min. After sonication, the extraction was continued by maceration of tissue for 48 h in the dark at room temperature. Finally, the extracts were filtered through Whatman filter paper No. 1 to a volumetric flask and filled with methanol up to 10 mL. The extracts were stored at room temperature for further analyses.
